answer.a_tehuah: <select1,1,1>['possessor of stones' , 'possessor of stones (= person who lives in a stony place)']

explanation.rules:
In compound nouns the left-hand part modifies the right-hand one. A noun gets the
ending -tl/li unless it has one of the suffixes -capil (dimin.), -huah ‘one who has . . . ’, -tlah/lah
‘place of many . . . ’, or -tzintli ‘revered . . . ’ (-li and -lah after l, otherwise -tl and -tlah).
